overview:
Twitter - @davehonig

David is an online advertising veteran with more than 15 years of digital experience.

Current David is Vice President, Business Development at Buddy Media. Buddy Media is the social enterprise software of choice for eight of the world’s top ten global advertisers, empowering them to build and maintain relationships with their consumers in a connections-based world. The Buddy Media social marketing suite helps brands build powerful connections globally with its scalable, secure architecture and data-driven customer insights from initial point of contact through point of purchase.

Prior to Buddy Media, David co-founded Media6Degrees, where he helped build a technology that provides major brand marketers with targeted audiences using the power of social graph data. Media6Degrees is the pioneer in Social Targeting. Using it proprietary Social Targeting technology, Media6Degrees builds and optimizes audiences based on a brandâ€™s existing customers and delivers high-performing advertising campaigns at scale

Prior to Media6Degrees David was Vice President, Media, at Didit Search Marketing, where he created SearchConnect, the first integrated media platform that combined Search Data & Display advertising with Re-Targeting. Under his direction, SearchConnect won the ClickZ Marketing Echo Excellence Award in 2007 for Best Behavioral Targeting Personalization technology.

David began his internet career at online ad giant DoubleClick, which has since merged with Google, where he spent four years in various sales management roles.

David has been an Board Advisor to Interclick which sold to Yahoo in November 2011.

David resides in New Jersey with his wife and twin girls, and in his spare time enjoys an occasional golf game, but not very good. He obtained a B.S. in Business and Marketing from Ohio State University.

milestones.description: Salesforce to Acquire Buddy Media for as Much as $745 Million
